claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: A flow chart titled “Fig. 1. Flow chart of subject participation in the study,” showing enrollment and allocation of subjects into safety populations (n=2344 and n=2304) with no molecular or production details. does not support the claim because the figure only depicts participant flow and safety population sizes and contains no information on vaccine production methods, mutations, or their impact on effectiveness. Note: The figure is a simple enrollment flow chart; no data on egg- or cell-based vaccine manufacturing or mutations are presented.
